languages.text: {n}Таддуа бросает на коменданта тяжелый взгляд — и бухается на колени.{/n} "Клянусь всем что свято, кровью праведников и Его именем — не имел за душой намерения подвести вас, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}! Смилуйтесь!"

{n}Taddua looks at the commander grimly and falls to his knees.{/n} "I swear on everything that is holy, on the blood of martyrs and His name — it was never in my thoughts to cause you grief, Your Celestial Highness. Have mercy!"
languages.original_text: {n}Таддуа бросает на коменданта тяжелый взгляд — и бухается на колени.{/n} "Клянусь всем что свято, кровью праведников и Его именем — не имел за душой намерения подвести вас, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}! Смилуйтесь!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ursus looks at the commander grimly and falls to his knees.{/n} "I swear on everything that is holy, on the blood of martyrs and His name — it was never in my thoughts to cause you grief, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Have mercy!"

{n}Taddua looks at the commander grimly and falls to his knees.{/n} "I swear on everything that is holy, on the blood of martyrs and His name — it was never in my thoughts to cause you grief, Your Celestial Highness. Have mercy!"

languages.text: {n}塔杜亚凶狠地瞪了指挥官一眼，跪倒在地。{/n}“我以一切神圣之名，对义人的鲜血与神皇的圣名起誓，我从没想过要让您如此不满，来自上界的大人！求求您，发发慈悲吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}Taddua looks at the commander grimly and falls to his knees.{/n} "I swear on everything that is holy, on the blood of martyrs and His name — it was never in my thoughts to cause you grief, Your Celestial Highness. Have mercy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}塔杜亚凶狠地瞪了指挥官一眼，跪倒在地。{/n}“我以一切神圣之名，对义人的鲜血与神皇的圣名起誓，我从没想过要让您如此不满，来自上界的大人！求求您，发发慈悲吧！”
{n}乌苏斯凶狠地瞪了指挥官一眼，跪倒在地。{/n}“我以一切神圣之名，对义人的鲜血与神皇的圣名起誓，我从没想过要让您如此不满，来自上界的大人！求求您，发发慈悲吧！”

languages.text: {n}Taddua lanza una mirada sombría al comandante y se postra de rodillas.{/n} «Juro por todo lo que es sagrado, por la sangre de los mártires y por Su nombre, que jamás se me ha pasado por la cabeza agravarle en modo alguno, Excelencia Celestial. ¡Apiádese de mí!».
languages.original_text: {n}Taddua looks at the commander grimly and falls to his knees.{/n} "I swear on everything that is holy, on the blood of martyrs and His name — it was never in my thoughts to cause you grief, Your Celestial Highness. Have mercy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Taddua lanza una mirada sombría al comandante y se postra de rodillas.{/n} «Juro por todo lo que es sagrado, por la sangre de los mártires y por Su nombre, que jamás se me ha pasado por la cabeza agravarle en modo alguno, Excelencia Celestial. ¡Apiádese de mí!».

{n}Ursus lanza una mirada sombría al comandante y se postra de rodillas.{/n} «Juro por todo lo que es sagrado, por la sangre de los mártires y por Su nombre, que jamás se me ha pasado por la cabeza agravarle en modo alguno, Excelencia Celestial. ¡Apiádese de mí!».

languages.text: {n}Taddua, komutana sertçe bakıp dizlerinin üzerine çöküyor.{/n} "Kutsal olan her şey üzerine, şehitlerin kanı ve O'nun adı üzerine yemin ederim ki asla sizi kederlendirme düşüncesinde değildim Semavi Efendimiz. Merhamet edin!"
languages.original_text: {n}Taddua looks at the commander grimly and falls to his knees.{/n} "I swear on everything that is holy, on the blood of martyrs and His name — it was never in my thoughts to cause you grief, Your Celestial Highness. Have mercy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Taddua, komutana sertçe bakıp dizlerinin üzerine çöküyor.{/n} "Kutsal olan her şey üzerine, şehitlerin kanı ve O'nun adı üzerine yemin ederim ki asla sizi kederlendirme düşüncesinde değildim Semavi Efendimiz. Merhamet edin!"

{n}Ursus, komutana sertçe bakıp dizlerinin üzerine çöküyor.{/n} "Kutsal olan her şey üzerine, şehitlerin kanı ve O'nun adı üzerine yemin ederim ki asla sizi kederlendirme düşüncesinde değildim Semavi Efendimiz. Merhamet edin!"

languages.text: {n}タッドゥアは顔をゆがめて司令官の方を見ると、ひざまずく。{/n}「聖なるすべて、殉教者たちの血、あのお方の名の下に誓います！あなたを困らせるつもりなどまったくありませんでした、天の閣下。どうかお慈悲を！」
languages.original_text: {n}Taddua looks at the commander grimly and falls to his knees.{/n} "I swear on everything that is holy, on the blood of martyrs and His name — it was never in my thoughts to cause you grief, Your Celestial Highness. Have mercy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アーサスは顔をゆがめて司令官の方を見ると、ひざまずく。{/n}「聖なるすべて、殉教者たちの血、あのお方の名の下に誓います！あなたを困らせるつもりなどまったくありませんでした、天の閣下。どうかお慈悲を！」
{n}アーサスは顔をゆがめて司令官の方を見ると、ひざまずく。{/n}「聖なるすべて、殉教者たちの血、あのお方の名の下に誓います！あなたを困らせるつもりなどまったくありませんでした、天の閣下。どうかお慈悲を！」

languages.text: {n}Taddua adresse un regard noir au commandant et s'agenouille devant vous.{/n} « Je jure sur tout ce qui est sacré en ce monde, sur le sang des martyrs et Son auguste nom, qu'il n'a jamais été dans mon intention de vous décevoir, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Ayez pitié ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Taddua looks at the commander grimly and falls to his knees.{/n} "I swear on everything that is holy, on the blood of martyrs and His name — it was never in my thoughts to cause you grief, Your Celestial Highness. Have mercy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Taddua adresse un regard noir au commandant et s'agenouille devant vous.{/n} « Je jure sur tout ce qui est sacré en ce monde, sur le sang des martyrs et Son auguste nom, qu'il n'a jamais été dans mon intention de vous décevoir, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Ayez pitié ! »

{n}Ursus adresse un regard noir au commandant et s'agenouille devant vous.{/n} « Je jure sur tout ce qui est sacré en ce monde, sur le sang des martyrs et Son auguste nom, qu'il n'a jamais été dans mon intention de vous décevoir, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Ayez pitié ! »

languages.text: {n}Taddua sieht den Kommandanten finster an und fällt auf die Knie.{/n} "Ich schwöre bei allem, was heilig ist, auf das Blut der Märtyrer und Seinen Namen ... es lag mir fern, Euch zu verärgern, Eure himmlische Hoheit. Habt Gnade!"
languages.original_text: {n}Taddua looks at the commander grimly and falls to his knees.{/n} "I swear on everything that is holy, on the blood of martyrs and His name — it was never in my thoughts to cause you grief, Your Celestial Highness. Have mercy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Taddua sieht den Kommandanten finster an und fällt auf die Knie.{/n} "Ich schwöre bei allem, was heilig ist, auf das Blut der Märtyrer und Seinen Namen ... es lag mir fern, Euch zu verärgern, Eure himmlische Hoheit. Habt Gnade!"

{n}Ursus blickt den Kommandanten finster an und fällt auf die Knie.{/n} "Ich schwöre bei allem, was heilig ist, auf das Blut der Märtyrer und Seinen Namen ... es lag mir fern, Euch zu verärgern, Eure himmlische Hoheit. Habt Gnade!"
